name: Subway Euro Bullet Train: Real Driving Experience
name_original: Subway Euro Bullet Train: Real Driving Experience
description:
Have you ever handle and experience the fastest wheels on the planet? Yes now you are going to handle and ride the extreme and fastest bullet train the man has ever made in Subway Euro Bullet
Train: Real Driving Experience. You have to travel through multiple train station which are located on fantastic sceneries and beautiful locations and become the perfect railway railroad driver that features track changing, handle extreme weather conditions, surprising environments in which you have to drive & handle the speeding bullet metro train. This game is very interesting and challenging for the metro train simulator lovers. Once you played this game you will be addicted till you complete and end this game. Stop the train before you enter the danger zone. Change the camera view as per your comfort, pick up all the passengers to drop at their respective destinations. You will experience a real engine driving skills. Prepare yourself for the fast moving action thrill of bullet train ride! This fast Subway Euro Bullet Train: Real Driving Experience is the best train simulation railroad game on apple platform. In this game you will experience this monster drive by yourself and you have to show your skills with full of fun and a real joy.
Be the best train driver & station master in this bullet train driving simulator. So what are you waiting for? Download this addictive Subway Euro Bullet Train: Real Driving Experience 3D simulation game and become the best speeding bullet train driver and rider among your circle!
Special Features:
• Realistic Engine Physics
• High Resolution 3D Graphics
• Addictive and Challenging Missions
• Amazing Sound Effects
